author: Simply Wall St
title: Risks Still Elevated At These Prices As Studio Mir Co., LTD (KOSDAQ:408900) Shares Dive 32%
text:
South Korea- /
Entertainment- /
- KOSDAQ:A408900
Risks Still Elevated At These Prices As Studio Mir Co., LTD (KOSDAQ:408900) Shares Dive 32%
The Studio Mir Co., LTD (KOSDAQ:408900) share price has softened a substantial 32% over the previous 30 days, handing back much of the gains the stock has made lately. The recent drop completes a disastrous twelve months for shareholders, who are sitting on a 69% loss during that time.
Although its price has dipped substantially, given around half the companies in Korea's Entertainment industry have price-to-sales ratios (or "P/S") below 1.5x, you may still consider Studio Mir as a stock to avoid entirely with its 4.8x P/S ratio. Nonetheless, we'd need to dig a little deeper to determine if there is a rational basis for the highly elevated P/S.
This technology could replace computers: discover the 20 stocks are working to make quantum computing a reality.
 Check out our latest analysis for Studio Mir
What Does Studio Mir's Recent Performance Look Like?
As an illustration, revenue has deteriorated at Studio Mir over the last year, which is not ideal at all. It might be that many expect the company to still outplay most other companies over the coming period, which has kept the P/S from collapsing. However, if this isn't the case, investors might get caught out paying too much for the stock.
Want the full picture on earnings, revenue and cash flow for the company? Then ourfree report on Studio Mirwill help you shine a light on its historical performance.
What Are Revenue Growth Metrics Telling Us About The High P/S?
The only time you'd be truly comfortable seeing a P/S as steep as Studio Mir's is when the company's growth is on track to outshine the industry decidedly.
Taking a look back first, the company's revenue growth last year wasn't something to get excited about as it posted a disappointing decline of 24%. Regardless, revenue has managed to lift by a handy 22% in aggregate from three years ago, thanks to the earlier period of growth. Accordingly, while they would have preferred to keep the run going, shareholders would be roughly satisfied with the medium-term rates of revenue growth.
Comparing the recent medium-term revenue trends against the industry's one-year growth forecast of 16% shows it's noticeably less attractive.
With this information, we find it concerning that Studio Mir is trading at a P/S higher than the industry. Apparently many investors in the company are way more bullish than recent times would indicate and aren't willing to let go of their stock at any price. Only the boldest would assume these prices are sustainable as a continuation of recent revenue trends is likely to weigh heavily on the share price eventually.
The Bottom Line On Studio Mir's P/S
Even after such a strong price drop, Studio Mir's P/S still exceeds the industry median significantly. We'd say the price-to-sales ratio's power isn't primarily as a valuation instrument but rather to gauge current investor sentiment and future expectations.
The fact that Studio Mir currently trades on a higher P/S relative to the industry is an oddity, since its recent three-year growth is lower than the wider industry forecast. Right now we aren't comfortable with the high P/S as this revenue performance isn't likely to support such positive sentiment for long. Unless there is a significant improvement in the company's medium-term performance, it will be difficult to prevent the P/S ratio from declining to a more reasonable level.
Don't forget that there may be other risks. For instance, we've identified 3 warning signs for Studio Mir (1 is potentially serious) you should be aware of.

author: @mint
title: The empowerment of women is set to strengthen our democracy | Mint
text: The empowerment of women is set to strengthen our democracy Summary - The participation of women in electoral exercises has risen impressively and could outstrip that of men within this decade. Women represent half the world’s population and are still largely excluded from political decision making. In India’s Lok Sabha elections, the number of women contestants seats increased from 3% of all parliamentary candidates in 1957 to 6% in 2009 and further to 9% in 2019, the last such polls held. The representation of women in the Lok Sabha, meanwhile, has increased from 4.5% in 1957 to 10.9% in 2009 and further to 14.4% in 2019. The numbers make it clear that political representation in the country is dominated by men. It will take a lot more effort to increase the participation of women, which is a very important aspect of women’s empowerment in general. author: @Vse42ru
title: Оставшаяся без игрушки Labubu китаянка покончила с собой в ТЦ
text:
В одном из китайских ТЦ девушка лишила себя жизни после того, как не смогла купить популярную игрушку Labubu.
Безрезультатная попытка приобретения популярной игрушки Labubu стала причиной суицида китаянки.
Как пишет mk.ru со ссылкой на зарубежные источники, молодая девушка пришла в местный торговый центр с целью приобретения фигурки.
Однако между ней и другими желающими совершить покупку данного атрибута произошел конфликт, который перерос в драку. В конечном итоге китаянка осталась без заветной игрушки.
По предварительным данным, после произошедшего девушка наложила на себя руки, не покидая территорию торгового центра.

author: Sydney Goldberg
title: Fantastic weekend weather, slightly cooler temperatures next week
text: Fantastic weekend weather, slightly cooler temperatures next week BATON ROUGE, La. (WAFB) - Today’s Outlook: Much of the same remains today as we start off our weekend with another cool morning in the low to mid 60s. Once again, expect temperatures to quickly warm to the low 90s by the afternoon underneath clear sunny skies. Today’s high should top out right around the 90 degrees. Temperatures should fall nicely into the low to mid 80s for LSU v. Ole Miss kickoff in Tiger Stadium. Clear skies remain and throughout the game allowing for temperatures will make their way down into the 70s, making for a cool and comfortable evening. The next fall front Daytime highs are still warm in the low 90s through Monday, which is above normal for this time of year. Another cold front looks to arrive on Tuesday, helping to usher in another round of dry and cool air from the north. High temperatures fall below normal, possibly as low as the upper 70s, and mornings as cool as the low 50s. Extended Outlook The stretch of pleasant sunny and dry days remains through the next work week. Afternoon temperatures stay in the low 90s through Monday ahead of our next fall front to help cool us down slightly below normal for the middle latter part of next week. Rain chances don’t come back into the forecast until beyond the next seven days into next weekend and early next week. [Click here](mailto:typo@wafb.com) to report a typo. author: Owen Crisafulli
title: Jay Bilas Takes Strong Stance Against North Carolina After Huge Win Over San Diego State
text:
The North Carolina Tar Heels rolled past the San Diego State Aztecs in their First Four matchup on Tuesday night, with the final score settling in at 95-68. However, just because they won doesn't mean that Jay Bilas feels any differently about North Carolina's inclusion in the 2025 NCAA Tournament.
The Tar Heels were among the most controversial picks for the bracket this year, as folks felt they were undeserving of earning a bid for the tournament. Their athletic director, Bubba Cunningham, (who is also the chairman of the NCAA Tournament selection committee) addressed the decision after facing backlash from fans.
"The last four teams that were out ... it was a tough call," Cunningham said. "The next team out was West Virginia, and they had an outstanding year and, unfortunately, knowing Tucker DeVries was hurt, player availability is something that we talk about quite a bit. Indiana was close, Ohio State was close, Boise (State) was close."
For one game at least, the Tar Heels looked like they belonged in the tournament. In Bilas' eyes, though, one win doesn't justify their inclusion in the bracket of 64 teams, especially when considering several other worthy teams were passed over in favor of North Carolina.
"What happens in the tournament doesn't validate your inclusion, and it doesn't say that if a No. 1 seed loses in the first or second round that they didn't belong in the tournament or didn't deserve their No. 1 seed, it's based on your body of work," Bilas said on "First Take."
"What happens in the tournament doesn't validate your inclusion."
— First Take (@FirstTake)[@JayBilas]and[@MadDogUnleashed]on if UNC proved that they belong in the NCAA tournament after their win against San Diego State.[pic.twitter.com/Y3jUgJrWn4][March 19, 2025]
Chances are the Tar Heels won't care too much what people are saying about them, so long as they keep on winning. They will have another shot to prove they belong in the NCAA Tournament when they take on the Ole Miss Rebels in their Round of 64 matchup on Friday, March 21 at 4:05 p.m. EST.

author: Tola y Maruja
title: Carta al Niño Jesús, por Tola y Maruja | EL ESPECTADOR
text: Querido niño Jesús, No nos parece prudente nacer en este momento, y menos en Belén, tan cerquita de Gaza, donde Herodes Netanyau está matando a los niños inocentes. Creemos, oh Niño, que la humanidad no merece tu sacrificio pues mientras la vida muere en Ucrania y Palestina nosotros comemos natilla y bailamos Ay maldita Navidad… Y lo más triste es que los fariseos, que dicen defender la vida y que meten presas a las pobres mujeres que abortan, no dicen ni mu de los bebés aplastados en Gaza. Sepulcros blanqueados." ,"hasPart": { "@type": "WebPageElement", "isAccessibleForFree": false, "cssSelector": ".paywall

author: The Star Online
title: MetMalaysia: Thunderstorms and strong winds expected in six states | The Star
text:
PETALING JAYA: Thunderstorms, heavy rain and strong winds have been forecast for Selangor, Perak, Johor and Kuala Lumpur.
In an advisory issued by the Meteorological Department at 9am on Thursday (March 6), thunderstorms are expected over the state of Perak, Selangor, Negri Sembilan, Melaka, Johor and Kuala Lumpur.
Also affected are Perak (Hilir Perak), Selangor (Sabak Bernam, Kuala Selangor, Klang, Gombak, Petaling, Kuala Langat and Sepang, Negri Sembilan (Seremban, Port Dickson, Rembau and Tampin), Melaka, Johor (Tangkak, Segamat, Muar, Batu Pahat, Kluang, Pontian, Kulai, Kota Tinggi and Johor Baru) and Kuala Lumpur.
Also seeing rains are Sandakan (Beluran) and Kudat (Pitas and Kudat) in Sabah.
The advisory is until 1pm today.

author: Logan Carter
title: Un nativo angeleno aprendió cómo conducir sobre nieve y hielo; es posible
text:
soy nativo
angelino, nacido y criado con dos años en Bostón donde no conducir mucho, así que nunca realmente impulsado en nieve hasta que recientemente me invitaron al Bridgestone Invierno Escuela de conducción en Steamboat Springs, Colorado. Afortunadamente, la clima estaba entre 40 y 50 grados durante el día, así que no congelar hasta la muerte, pero este pequeño y pintoresco pueblo de montaña todavía estaba cubierto por una importante capa de nieve, suficiente para intimidarme.
La Blizzak de Bridgestone
neumáticos de nieve Me impresionó y de alguna manera logré encontrar agarre sobre el hielo a pesar de mi lucha por ignorar mi experiencia de conducción exclusivamente en un clima mediterráneo y Empecé a escuchar la sabiduría que me impartió mi instructor. Una vez que hice mis primeras carreras en el curso, obtuve una toneladas de confianza en los neumáticos y pude soltarme todo y empezar a absorber algunos de los consejos que me ofrecía mi Oakley. Yoda de conducción en la nieve con un mullet blandiendo , instructor Nick Strickler.
Aparte de
llantas, Yo estaba allí para aprender estrategias para mantenerme seguro al conducir en carreteras nevadas o heladas. Me sorprendió aprender una nueva línea de conducción para navegar seguramente en una esquina helada ; los experimentados Los entrenadores de conducción de la Escuela de Manejo de Invierno nos enseñaron cuál es la manera más rápida de navegar en una curva helada mientras se mantiene el control del automóvil. es frenar exclusivamente en la recta, apuntar ampliamente a la vuelta, soltar el freno luego girar la rueda aproximadamente media vuelta y Dejé que los neumáticos hicieran el trabajo. Me sorprendió lo lento que tuve que tomar turnos incluso con los impresionantes neumáticos Blizzak de Bridgestone, pero Estas curvas estaban increíblemente heladas. El “ápice” que intentas alcanzar llega notablemente tarde, básicamente una vez que ya has completado el giro. , pero esta estrategia produjo los mejores resultados para mitigar el subviraje al entrar en la curva y el sobreviraje al salir.
Lo que más me impresionó fue el agarre de estos
https://jalopnik.com/heres-how-ev-tires-differ-from-regular-tires-1851217581 encontrado en frenado de emergencia escenarios. Detener un automóvil sobre el hielo no parece fácil, pero pisa el freno y las Blizzaks parecen Muerde el hielo y detente con sorprendente eficiencia. Este es un enorme beneficio de seguridad, ya que la forma más fácil de evitar un accidente es deteniéndose antes de que se produzca el impacto; solo asegúrese de dejar un espacio sólido entre su vehículo y el vehículo delante de usted cuando conducir sobre superficies resbaladizas. Bridgestone incluso nos dejó probar algunos neumáticos de nieve de la competencia, que trataré en un artículo aparte. Solo debes saber que , al menos en una prueba organizada por Bridgestone, con sus coches, instructores y pista, los Blizzaks ofrecieron la mejor combinación de agarre lateral y rendimiento de frenado.
Aprendí algunos otros
trucos, como la importancia de girar y acelerar suaves al conducir sobre hielo. He visto principalmente carreras del WRC en condiciones de nieve donde el La directiva es concluir el circuito lo más rápido físicamente posible, por lo que esperaba más movimientos escandinavos y colas de gallo gigantes saliendo de mis llantas traseras, pero estábamos allí para aprender a controlar nuestros autos de manera segura. Después de terminar mi día en la Escuela de Manejo de Invierno, Me siento mucho más seguro de mi capacidad para mantener el control de un vehículo sobre nieve y hielo, y sé que no debería hacerlo Conduzco mi Mini a las montañas con mis neumáticos de verano y espero buenos resultados.

author: Newswatch 16
title: A farewell to winter at Lackawanna State Park | On The Pennsylvania Road - NewsBreak
text:
Lackawanna County, Pennsylvania
A farewell to winter at Lackawanna State Park | On The Pennsylvania Road
15 minutes ago
LACKAWANNA COUNTY, Pa. — It's almost like a Pennsylvania holiday celebration, the first mild days after a long, cold winter. Jon Meyer was like many others this week, feeling the need to get outside and soak in the sunshine, saying farewell to the coldest winter in more than a decade On The Pennsylvania Road.
